title: Env Docs: Local vs Container
description: Adds docs that describe how to work locally vs container, referencing Settings by name only.

with.text:
# Environment

This repo supports both local development and container-based development.

## Local
- Use your configured environment settings.
- Use Settings presets by name (example: rolePreset: "fast").

## Container
- Container scaffolding in this repo is a template.
- Select base images and tool installs according to your environment policy.

## Optional services
- docker-compose.yml contains placeholders for DB/cache/queue.
- Choose the vendor and credentials via Settings and runtime configuration.
